entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Corner Brook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:18 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 07:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -12.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -14.1°C
Wind: NNE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then becoming northeast 20 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023
